name: 7th International Conference on Software Engineering and Applications
content: 7th International Conference on Software Engineering and Applications (SOFEA 2021) October 23 \~ 24, 2021, Sydney, Australia https://csen2021.org/sofea/index Scope 7th International Conference on Software Engineering and Applications (SOFEA 2021) is a forum for presenting new advances and research results in the fields of Software Engineering and Applications. The conference will bring together leading researchers, engineers and scientists in the domain of interest from around the world in these areas. Authors are solicited to contribute to this conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in Control Theory and Computer Modelling. Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following • Advances in Software Engineering • Knowledge-based Systems and Formal Methods • Languages and Formal Methods • Managing Software Projects • Multimedia and Visual Software Engineering • Quality Management • Search Engines and Information Retrieval • Software Engineering Decision Making • Software Engineering Practice • Software Maintenance and Testing • Software Process • Web Engineering • Web-based Education Systems and Learning Applications Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by October 09, 2021\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Computer Science Conference Proceedings in Computer Science & Information Technology (CS & IT) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from SOFEA 2021, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journal.  International Journal of Software Engineering & Applications (IJSEA)  Computer Science & Engineering: An International Journal (CSEIJ)  International Journal of Security, Privacy and Trust Management (IJSPTM) Important Dates • Submission Deadline: October 09, 2021 • Authors Notification: October 11, 2021 • Registration & camera - Ready Paper Due: October 14, 2021 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : sofea@csen2021.org (or) sofeaconfe@yahoo.com
